Module io.inverno.mod.web
Package io.inverno.mod.web

Interface ErrorWebRouteManager

All Superinterfaces:
RouteManager<ErrorWebExchange<Throwable>,​ErrorWebRouter,​ErrorWebRouteManager,​ErrorWebRoute,​ErrorExchange<Throwable>>
public interface ErrorWebRouteManager extends RouteManager<ErrorWebExchange<Throwable>,​ErrorWebRouter,​ErrorWebRouteManager,​ErrorWebRoute,​ErrorExchange<Throwable>>

An error web route manager is used to manage the routes of an error web router. It is created by an error web router and allows to define, enable, disable, remove and find error web routes in an error web router.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Jeremy Kuhn
See Also:
ErrorWebExchange, ErrorWebRoute, ErrorWebRouter

  • Method Details

    • handler

      ErrorWebRouter handler​(ErrorWebExchangeHandler<? extends Throwable> handler)

      Specifies the route error web exchange handler.

      This method basically appends the route specified in the error web route manager to the error web router it comes from.

      Parameters:
      handler - the route error web exchange handler
      Returns:
      the router
